website_summaries.verdict: Whether you prefer products made with natural ingredients or need a permanent hair color that's not extremely harsh or drying, Naturtint is worth a try.
pros: Doesn't contain parabens, ammonia, and other artificial additives that can be harsh on hair and skin
Made with plant-based ingredients that are nourishing and moisturizing to hair
Many repeat uses brag about natural-looking results
cons: Price falls on the higher end of the scale
Some shades look brassy or too red on some users

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Buy This Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because of its claim to be less toxic than other similar products. I have been buying this product for the last 18 months. The last 3 times I’ve used it (slow learner here), I have found that they have completely changed the formula. I have experienced chemical burn on my ears and neck, runny nose and swollen watery eyes. They have changed their formula, probably sold out, and are NO LONGER TOXIC FREE! I though it was me, but I followed the instructions to a tee, it is toxic and dangerous. PLEASE DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Niki Brosnan

customer_reviews.title: Increased hair loss
customer_reviews.text: Immediately after coloring, my hair felt amazing. However, when it was time to wash the next day or so with the included shampoo and conditioner, I lost double the amount of hair as I usually lose. Also, after styling my hair was so dry, brittle, and frizzy. I really liked the idea of how natural this color was, but it didn’t help the texture of my hair whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Gave me very bad skin reaction
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this item form Vitamin shop, since it wasn't available any longer I went ahead and got from Amazon. This was my worst day when I applied the color. AFter couple days , not right away gave me blisters on my ears and red rashes all over my neck area. My skin was burning for days. I had the worst time of my life applying this color. I took so may steroid medicine and creams to have my skin cool off. Please use this color- Terracotta 7C Naturtint very very cautiously... Or stay away I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Color stays true, doesn’t fade or turn brassy
customer_reviews.text: I love Naturtint, it’s the best permanent hair color that I’ve ever used, and I’ve tried them all. The color stays true, does not fade or turn brassy. I have medium brown hair with gray in it, and I dye it a medium neutral blonde (8N). Other hair colors I’ve used turn brassy after a few weeks, this does not, I’ve finally found a great permanent dye! It has lots of nice tones too, it’s not a flat color. It’s great, I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased. I mixed 7N (Hazelnut Blond) and 8A (Ash ...
customer_reviews.text: This hair color was different than Revlon Colorsik that I've used for years. It was a more goopy, thick formula with less chemical odor. I would say that the color looks more natural and my hair is not as damaged. I'm very pleased. I mixed 7N (Hazelnut Blond) and 8A (Ash Blond) in equal parts and my hair came out a little lighter than Revlon Colorsilk 61 (Dark Blond). So these colors may be slightly darker than other brands, which I've also ready in people's reviews. I also used a full packet of Ardell Red Gold Corrector plus to reduce red tones that appear when lightening brown hair.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schiller

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH HAIR FELL OUT
customer_reviews.text: My hair grows out light blonde. I wish I would have taken a before picture, but I forgot. I guess it did dye my roots decently, but A BUNCH OF MY HAIR FEEL OUT. The picture doesnt even show all of the hair because half of it went down the drain. I used exactly as instructed and didnt leave in my hair for more than 30 minutes. This was supposed to be a more natural, less harmful option, but it definitely is not.
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Good product for those with eczema, great color!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for over a year now and no allergic reactions. I have eczema on my neck and all other hair dyes leave me with an itchy rash. My stylist says the "amount" of dye is not consistent. Sometimes she has plenty of dye to do my entire head of long/thick hair, sometimes she barely makes it and scrapes the bottle. Would have given 5 stars if not for the inconsistent amount of color in the bottle. Made in Spain! My color 3N Dark Chestnut Brown covers my very silver-gray hair.
customer_reviews.author: LZ

customer_reviews.title: Cruelty free
customer_reviews.text: Great product with no harsh chemicals. Smells great and lightens my hair better that other products I have used. Best of all: Cruelty free! Why would anyone use any other products that cause so much suffering for animals....I am so thankful to anyone that buys this product. Think beauty without harm!
customer_reviews.author: winnbiz

customer_reviews.title: I get many compliments that my hair does not look damaged like other dyed hair
customer_reviews.text: I can't stand the smell of store brand hair dye, they bother my Asthma. My hair is medium brown and my friend who is a Hairsylist told me THIS WOULD NOT LIGHTEN MY HAIR enough...well she was wrong! I used 9N or 10N and I have light blonde hair. I get many compliments that my hair does not look damaged like other dyed hair.
customer_reviews.author: PoolGuyDWG

customer_reviews.title: Color name is not accurate!
customer_reviews.text: This color (Dark Blonde) is so far removed from being in the blonde category!! It comes out quite a bit darker than expected. I wanted my hair to be lighter than it ended up being. Its more like a true medium brown.
customer_reviews.author: Deogirl

customer_reviews.title: I love this color
customer_reviews.text: I love this color. I have gotten lots of compliments on this. It is definitely more honey colored than the picture on the box. It actually looks very different than any dye I've ever seen. Although this is natural, I know it probably has some chemicals that aren't exactly super healthy (slight chemical smell). However, it smells much less noxious than the national brands.
customer_reviews.author: LauraBee

customer_reviews.title: works ok but you will need a blue shampoo
customer_reviews.text: When I used this product it turned my hair orange and yellow at 1st so I used zerran blue shampoo. After 3 blue shampoo washes my hair finally was the color I wanted. I have blond hair already but I wanted it lighter. I called naturtint about the Yellow/Orange tint, they suggested mixing 10a with 10n. So in 6 weeks I will try that mix. I attached a pic. Updated 1/31/16: I bought the 10a and 10n mixed together and applied. Made my hair look more yellow and orange. I think I am going to not use this product again. Did not give me the results I wanted. I was hopeful but just did not give me the color :(
customer_reviews.author: HWStyle

customer_reviews.title: I received the product yesterday. The package looks very ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the product yesterday. The package looks very old and ripped. It seems to be opened before. It was fulfilled directly from Amazon, not Naturtint. The picture on the package is totally different from my online order. This is not acceptable at all!
customer_reviews.author: Healthy Tree

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could return this product but I've used it. This is one of my worst hair colors ever used. It has faded from my hair within a week's time. Never really changed my hair color at all. I would not spend the money on this product again.
customer_reviews.author: ANTM1985

customer_reviews.title: It worked better when I took this step first
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of grey and it did cover when I mixed it 50/50 with 8N. I made sure my hair was very clean with no cream rinse on it before I used it. I made sure my hair was dry when applying. It worked better when I took this step first.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen

customer_reviews.title: Most damaging Hair Color I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This really damaged my hair, more than regular boxed hair dye. Even more than highlighting my hair, and the damage is immediate. I carefully timed it and it didn't cover 50% of my grey. I used it twice and I will never use it again. The only good thing I can say about it is I had less of an allergic reaction to it than most boxed hair dyes. I am using Redken Beyond Cover now and it is far superior to anything else I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Classic Debut

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Been using Naturint for 3 yrs now.The color is true, application is just as easy as all other hair dyes BUT the difference is the conditioner. It not only leaves your hair manageable but shiny! Highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Antona

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy I found this dye
customer_reviews.text: I use Light Chestnut Brown 5N for root touch-up. It is a rich, multi-dimensional color. It lasts a long time. It does a great job covering grey. It's not smelly. It doesn't burn my scalp. But the best part is the TONE. My hair has ALWAYS pulled a ghastly red/copper color using box dye, but there is no trace of red in this dye. No glowing orange in the sunlight. My hair is very thick, coarse and shoulder length and I've been managing with 1 bottle but almost need 2 bottles to fully cover.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Usually don’t get allergic reactions, but did to this product
customer_reviews.text: Zero stars if I could. I handle normal hair dye well, but figured it was best heathwise to try something natural. Welp, three days after dying I have chemical burn on my ears. Hot, itchy, and uncomfortable. Also, made my hair feel so weighed down and greasy. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: rustoflatblack

customer_reviews.title: Best hair dye
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this brand of hair dye. It doesnt dry out and damage my hair like typical dyes. I normally buy it at the store, but figure d I'd go with amazon while i was ordering other products. This particular product was delayed and then delayed again. When it finally did show up, it was completely wrong. The color was wrong and the color name was not even similar to what I had ordered. I was refunded and will stick to picking it up in the store. BUT this brand is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Dars

customer_reviews.title: I had severe allergy to this product. My skull ...
customer_reviews.text: I had severe allergy to this product. My skull is itchy and skin was swollen. It is not safe as they advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Beware!!! DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: It smelled really weird and I got some color on my palm and it was stinging and my skin became crusty so I quickly washed it and I had already started applying the color in my hair so I quickly washed my hair too and threw away the color!!! Would never buy color online ever
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: HAIR FALLING OUT AND NO GRAY COVERAGE
customer_reviews.text: I color my girlfriend’s hair once a month. We’ve been using L’Oréal. When I had my hands in her hair, using Naturtint, her hair started to come out in my hands. How is this safer ? And this did NOT color her gray roots. Not one bit. This is why L’Oréal makes 4 billion dollars a year. People like and trust their products.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Natural hair color that doesn't burn
customer_reviews.text: product is very easy on the scalp and color is very consistent. started using this coloring when I found other products burned my scalp and caused what I thought was excessive hair loss. I recolor my hair every month to cover up roots.
customer_reviews.author: Donna J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: The color is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of the product and it looks just like the color described and on the box. It's also vegan and that is important! The leave-in conditioner is great! The only problem with this product is it doesn't last on the grey hairs that frame my face. I have to use a spray coverage after each washing in that area. I am going to take this to my colorist and see if see can match to it.
customer_reviews.author: Just Nan

customer_reviews.title: Great product if you have color allergies
customer_reviews.text: I use this colorant brand as I have a severe allergy to hair coloring. It works well to cover my now “white” hairs, I have been using it for over 5-6 years now. I miss going to the hairdressers to get it done, but I don’t miss the high cost to have it done! I usually buy this in a six pack as it is the best price then. I use to buy it a box at a time from my local stores, but it usually cost between $16-19.00 a box. If I purchase it in a six pack volume the price down to about $8.40 a box.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamere124

customer_reviews.title: Really non toxic. But not good for grays.
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked with delight ... this is so gentle. How can a hair color be so non toxic? It was so much easier to wash off my hair, too. Pure joy. The problem was gray coverage. It lasts half as long for me, maybe not even, compared to Nice N Easy. I am in a major dilemma because I loved everything else about this. I am going to try 5N next and hopefully that will be it.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome deep red color that covers all the grey hair
customer_reviews.text: I love this color. It's a very deep red. I do have quite a bit of gray hair and it covers beautifully. I just use it on the new growth that comes in. Of course it will get on the other longer hair but if you include all the hair each time it will make it darker and darker. Super easy application. I actually use my bigger bottle dispenser that I got at the beauty supply bc this liquid is pretty thick (so it runs less and stays on your hair better) so it comes out a bit better for me and my hands don't get so tired squeezing the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: happygirl

customer_reviews.title: Bad Experience
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a non-ammonia hair product, I went from champagne blonde by L'Oreal to the this honey blonde, came out rather "brassy", I have naturally dark strawberry blonde hair with some grey, length to my mid back. The coloring process did not take long, I am so glad I did not leave this on my crown longer than 15 minutes. I lost a TON of hair during the immediate shampoo/conditioning process, It has been a couple weeks now and I am still shedding full strands of hair. My hair lost it's soft bouncy look as well. I'm going to have to cut 2-4 inches to get rid of these damaged ends. SO disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cammie

customer_reviews.title: One of the bottles exploded!
customer_reviews.text: One of the bottles exploded in the box and since I discovered this after the return window closed (I did not open the box until I was ready to dye my hair which was months after purchase) I was not able to return the product. Faulty packaging! I wasted my money and will not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: NoneOfYourBizness

customer_reviews.title: Mild and plant based. Agrees with my hair.
customer_reviews.text: Is the only plant based product that I have found after making several comparisons. The fragrance is also mild. Initially the quantity in the container was more - I cannot exactly measure the ounces but I clearly notice that over a two year period the quantity of the colorant and base has reduced to almost half the container. It is not same as before and I have been using this product for the last 3-4 years.
customer_reviews.author: Wish

customer_reviews.title: Hair felt soft and shiny after use.
customer_reviews.text: I have dark blonde roots with highlights with “One’n Only” powder lighter from Sally’s with the Argan oil. I wanted to try Naturtint in hopes of not drying my hair out too much. When rinsing my color out it did feel a bit dry but once I put the included conditioner on my hair it became softer. I used the leave in conditioner as well. The final result was not completely to my liking, my hair has a strawberry blonde tint to it. I have hopes it was just the change in different products and I definitely will try a different color the next time.
customer_reviews.author: Florida wife

customer_reviews.title: Worst gray coverage I've ever hard
customer_reviews.text: Will definitely not buy this product again. I've been coloring my hair for over 10 years, and this is by far the worst gray coverage I've ever had -- and the most expensive color I've ever bought. (Followed directions completely.) Also, the color that smeared on the towel for 3-4 washings afterward was more than I've experienced with others. Only positive thing I can say is that the smell was not as bad. Will never use this again!!
customer_reviews.author: Mason's Mom

customer_reviews.title: I believe this is the safest color out there.
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of research, I decided that this is the safest permanent hair color on the market. Recently, they changed their old formula to make it even safer than it used to be (in order to be sold in Whole Foods stores), and I really felt the difference. In the past, I had a slight burning on my scalp, but not with this new formulation. VERY effective color with no toxic smells and no irritated scalp!
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think it’s organic and Chemical free
customer_reviews.text: Covered my grays but my hair shed a lot 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE COLOR ON THE BOX.....IM NOT HAPPY..
customer_reviews.text: I have used this color/ brand before and I'm deeply disappointed. My hair is a very DARK MAHOGANY WITH PINK UNDERTONES from using this " Terracotta blonde"... HORRIBLE DESCRIPTION OF COLOR AND TERRIBLE PICTURE ON THE BOX..I will NOT BUY THIS BRAND EVER AGAIN...
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Causes severe damage to hair.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Naturtint for about 5 years. In this recent purchase, I noticed that they changed their formula. Well, it totally fried my long hair and I'm going to have to take the extreme measure of cutting it short because there's no way to repair the damage. Needless to say, I am extremely unhappy. I will no longer use this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amygdala

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Won't buy again. My hair is dry and brittle after using this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Conley

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: The color I received is nothing like the picture in this listing. I would not be able to use it, I have to return it. It is not even a nice auburn, it looks like dirty blond.
customer_reviews.author: Viktoriya

customer_reviews.title: Great color from a natural product
customer_reviews.text: Great results from a natural product that is not tested on animals. I loved the color, I have medium brown hair and I was able to lighten my hair to light blond. It did give me bit of brass color close to the roots where I did not apply enough color, but that disappeared within 3 washes.
customer_reviews.author: winnbiz

customer_reviews.title: The best vegan hair dye I’ve used.
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used Naturtint I used a red paint and I loved the result, after I used the "Naturtint - Permanent Hair Colorant-Wheat Germ Blonde", and I had a very good experience. This color is beautiful but unfortunately the dye fades very fast, Now I used the "7c terracotta" and I loved it, my hair was blonde and the color was not as it is in the packaging, I left the ink 20 minutes longer to get a more intense tone and I really loved. I always use this paint because I think it's a great vegan option.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwillians

customer_reviews.title: Good but not for grey hairs.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because my hair is too sensible and fragile. I'm having my first grey hairs and now, I need to cover it. But this "permanent tint" does not cover them. It look pretty but after the first wash, my grey hair were there again.. shining as before. Not permanent.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: What's important to be is the health of my hair
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a product that would not be harsh on my hair and I feel this is the way to go for your hair to stay healthly. I am working on my hair game and I just discovered this watching a You Tude video and her hair always looks so good 😉
customer_reviews.author: Jalina Jay Cortes

customer_reviews.title: Great color match
customer_reviews.text: My wife picked this out because the product line offered a variety of shades, her choice was 7N... the color match is perfect. The big selling feature for us was no ammonia and healthier ingredients than other products. It did smell somewhat unpleasant the first day, and she used some nice smelling hair oil to get the smell out. Despite this, she is very happy with the product and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color in the box.
customer_reviews.text: The color was not the same as what was on the box. Dark blonde was actually a dark red. I threw it out. Could not use it. Used another light brown. As picture shows, the one on the left of photo was supposed to be 6N. It was not. I've never had this problem before.
customer_reviews.author: Millie R.

customer_reviews.title: Hairfall
customer_reviews.text: I bought it after doing a good amount of research for my mother but from the day she used it , it is now almost 2 months and she is having continuous hairfall since then. I had not imagined such a severe side effect of using this hair colour.
customer_reviews.author: amit singla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color, cruelty free, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: During the stay at home orders, I finally had to color my hair at home. I have always gone to a salon. I was shocked to find out that most hair colors come from China and are still tested on animals. I ordered Naturtint from the good reviews and wasn’t disappointed. I found it easy to mix and use. It covered my grey fine and although didn’t last as long as salon color- who cares? I just touched it up. I have short hair and only used less than 1/2 the box. 7 n was perfect color.
customer_reviews.author: K. Meacham

customer_reviews.title: Be warned
customer_reviews.text: Box label “light chestnut brown”... was anything but that... Might as well have been labeled “BLACK MAGIC MARKER STAIN”. Needles to say, I threw away the remaining contents of Shampoo and conditioners. Don’t waste your time with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael N

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I got it for wife and first time used last night. Very disappointing. It did not work at all. Her grey did not disappear and her hair became like a broom. Awful.
customer_reviews.author: NGerel

customer_reviews.title: Safety over performance
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom who is really hesitant to use any harsh product that would touch her skin. Helped her apply the hair color and she didn't have any issues with the product in terms of odor and feel on her scalp. The end result though reminded us of henna hair color -- there are strands that look a bit copper-ish so it doesn't have an even tint. I'm not sure if we didn't let the product "develop" longer but we sure kept it on for as long as instructed plus couple minutes more, yet it felt like the color didn't really last that long. It seemed to have faded after a little over a week.
customer_reviews.author: neenu

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves this brand
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes this brand, has never has an issue, and I like that I'm able to get a better price for these versus going to Whole Foods or other speciality stores.
customer_reviews.author: Shams B.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This line is great. Easy to use- no scent... honestly good proof. I’m a dark brunette ans I’m about 25% gray. I mostly use this to cover up my roots. I’ve used 3 different shades and they all go on super dark- but fade into my natural color. Currently I’m using light chestnut brown- which is basically dark brown on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: roxana

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The application bottle arrived with no top- the contents were rotten and unusable. Will never purchase again on-line.
customer_reviews.author: Moebean

customer_reviews.title: color was stable enough
customer_reviews.text: It did cover gray pretty well ( I got a tone darker than the one I had) The color was pretty stable and it did not smell bad. The hair did feel well at first (after the treatment with products provided) but got quite dry later and did require extra conditioning and moisturizing
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana S

customer_reviews.title: I would give negative but since I can't, i'll ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give negative but since I can't, i'll only give one star. THIS DOES NOT COVER GREY HAIR!! Do not be fooled as I thought it was just some spot that didn't get covered but it was multiple areas that didn't cover my grey hair. So if you're looking for grey hair coverage, do not get this!!
customer_reviews.author: Sksmsk7

customer_reviews.title: Gives a nice color.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this hair dye for around a year now and am satisfied with it. It lasts about 5-6 weeks before I need to hide the gray again. I have ash brown hair with some gray at the temples and sides and I use the dark blonde (6N).
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: I very much liked this product
customer_reviews.text: I very much liked this product. I'm into holistic products. I've been coloring my hair for over 50 years. The product is natural and the color was very natural looking. Over several weeks, it became lighter, being out in the sun and swimming and daily washes. However, I felt the color lasted longer than any other product. The only 'down' side is the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Focuslady

customer_reviews.title: It does come out really pretty and shiny
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving this product two stars for the color. It does come out really pretty and shiny. However, I had A LOT of hair fall after I used this. I'm going back to henna; it was more gentle on my scalp than Naturtint. I also wasn't too thrilled when I tipped the box over and saw the long list of ingredients. Like the color and I even liked the smell, but I had to cut my hair to correct the damage. I have coarse, thick, curly hair--and my hair isn't so curly after one use of this dye. I'm glad it seemed gentle for other people.
customer_reviews.author: Haelee

customer_reviews.title: This product is absolutely terrible! Any claims that this product is "all natural" ...
customer_reviews.text: I WOULD GIVE THIS ZERO STARS IF I COULD. This product is absolutely terrible! Any claims that this product is "all natural" are completely FALSE, as it is filled with peroxide and other chemicals. It burned my scalp and roots and completely ruined my hair! My hair turned orange and I had to go to a professional salon in order to resemble anything close to normal again. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Case

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Do not buy this product. I don’t know what they’ve added to their formula but I’ve rinsed my hair out six times and still have product in my hair. It feels like glue is in my hair...
customer_reviews.author: Cuttymcnutty

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this hair dye
customer_reviews.text: Nice non-stinky, non-chemical odor hair dye. Works great, just as good as when I go to the salon. Highly recommend. Love that there's a safer alternative to the traditional hair dye!
customer_reviews.author: K. Paynter

customer_reviews.title: and I'm very happy with this color
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brand for a year now, and I'm very happy with this color. However, my last order came damaged, colorant was not closed tightly and it spilled. I don't believe I should use it in this condition. It has been a huge disappointment, since I had an event planned.
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: PAID $13 FOR DAMAGED LEAKING TRASH.
customer_reviews.text: OUT OF 5 STARS THIS GETS NEGATIVE 5 TRASH CANS. 0 stars needs to be an option. 1 star is giving this wayyyyy too much credit. PAID $13 FOR DAMAGED TRASH. BEYOND DISAPPOINTED. TERRIBLE. BUSTED BOTTLE. THE LIQUID SEEPED THROUGH THE CARDBOARD BOX. LIFTED THE BOTTLE TO TRY AND SALVAGE WHAT WAS LEFT. LEAKING & DRIPPING EVERYWHERE. 1ST AND LAST TIME ORDERING. AWFUL EXPERIENCE.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Johansen

customer_reviews.title: 7N color
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered this color to combine it with 8A My haircolor came out beautifully. I retained the color #'s for future use.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Reina

customer_reviews.title: Great natural product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Doesn't really cover up the gray like it says. I use "Gray Magic" with it and that helps do the trick. I like that it's a product with no ammonia. My hair gets damaged enough from straightening and curling it. This helps to not damage it as much. I think this product started in Europe. Glad it finally came to the US!
customer_reviews.author: S. Con

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage for gray hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have a sensitive scalp and my scalp would always sting when getting my touch-ups at the hair salon. My daughter-in-law who also is a hairdresser introduced me to this product. The first time I used it I could not believe how well it covered my gray! The first time I used the product I used a darker shade. This time I went a little lighter coverage is great!
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: bad post-treatment experience
customer_reviews.text: Whilst the hair dye part was ok, the post colouring treatment was a horrible horrible mess. I had to wash my poor hair 4 times to get rid of this slimy silicony residue, and I haven't even used the whole pack for my long hair. I wish I just went for my usual organic and natural shampoo and conditioner. So never again I'm gonna risk it with Naturtint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT NATURAL!
customer_reviews.text: This product is misleading as the packaging and name is meant to make you think it is a natural product, it is not. It has some products from nature and MANY CHEMICALS!
customer_reviews.author: Beth K

customer_reviews.title: Turned my hair orange!
customer_reviews.text: The color turned my hair orange especially at the roots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hair dye
customer_reviews.text: The secret is out... I dye my hair. I was going to Sally's beauty to get hair dye but their solutions are toxic. And buying everything separately adds up. My friend introduced me to Naturtint. I bought my first couple packages at Whole Foods but now buy them on Amazon because it's cheaper. And they are Prime eligible. The great thing is that everything is included in the packet: hair dye, solution, gloves, shampoo & conditioner. Use an old towel to dry your hair for the first couple of weeks. My white towel turned brownish.
customer_reviews.author: AMW

customer_reviews.title: Regular size hair color, works without bleach and it does not damage fine gair
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure about the 2 oz size as it looked as much as the 4.5 oz. I have black fine hair and this color does not require bleaching for me and it does not damage the hair as the other hair colors I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Dan & Madi

customer_reviews.title: My favorite hair color
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand! I purchased the 8c color and it came out perfect. This is the only permanent hair color I’ve found that doesn’t irritate my scalp. Plus it’s vegan, cruelty free and smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that it doesn't contain the harmful chemicals ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought quite a few of this product in different colors. I like the fact that it doesn't contain the harmful chemicals used by other hair color products. There is a little bit of color bleeding within the week of coloring. So be aware that your white towel will see some color. It does wash off cleanly. I love the Mahogany color.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Not For My White Hair
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews and most said it was not really a blonde but darker. I wanted darker. On my hair, which is almost white, it turned a gold blonde. Very unhappy. Like this brand, but will go back to darker browns.
customer_reviews.author: Tilley

customer_reviews.title: Not lasting
customer_reviews.text: I have curly hair and struggled finding a good hair color tint. I read the description and this seemed to be a fit, but it really dried out my hair, lost the forming curls and lasted about 2 weeks -to be generous- won't be buying it again
customer_reviews.author: Gabs

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years and it works great! I used to buy the name brands from drugstores, but after the initial conditioning wore off, my hair would be really coarse even though I faithfully condition it. I switched to Naturtint and my hair is always soft. I get so many compliments, even from hairdressers, on the color and condition of my hair. It's quick and easy to use. The color lasts well and I only have to do it again when my roots start coming in. I have thick hair past my shoulder blades and I can do my recolors with one box. If I was completely changing colors, it would take two boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Average Product
customer_reviews.text: Average product - extensive processing time. Color faded in the same amount of time and washing as other products even when I used shampoo and conditioner that I purchased separately by naturtint. Liked the idea of a natural product but wasn't wowed in anyway by this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hooked on Travel

customer_reviews.title: Have used this for years - always great results
customer_reviews.text: makes my hair feel soft and silky. Great colors. I actually streak my own hair with various colors. I just put on a dark chestnut, Arizona red, and honey blonde. So you can highlight your own hair.!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. O

customer_reviews.title: A favorite product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Works great! I have been using this product for years and this light blonde works to cover up my dark brown roots! It doesn't smell bad like most hair dye and the price is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Justman

customer_reviews.title: Will order again
customer_reviews.text: I can not actually rate longevity but the product is top notch. I hated the way my hair felt right after use but once i washed and styled it amazing. We will see how long it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great natural dye
customer_reviews.text: Love the ingredients vs. most store-bought dyes. This doesn’t burn my eyes or scalp, has no scent, and colors nicely. The leave-in conditioner smells amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Murray

customer_reviews.title: love my 5N light chestnut brown naturtint This tint conditions
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was OK.. I indeed, love my 5N light chestnut brown naturtint This tint conditions, gives shine and makes my hair feels fuller .My dark brown hair has begun to gray at the temples so i purchased a light dawn to add some color to my grey streaks. The results were lovely ,Some of my greys tinted into a light ivory shade and other resistant grays blended in beautifully with the ivory tone. Thank You, Spain for these great tints !
customer_reviews.author: Frances H.

customer_reviews.title: nice (light brown) color
customer_reviews.text: combined with the 6G to cover grays/whites on light brown hair - doesn't have that terrible ammonia smell, and I really liked the shampoo, conditioner, and leave-in conditioner that came with it. However, I was looking for light brown, and it does appear to have made my hair a little red
customer_reviews.author: tzuardo

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: Color (of hair after using product) had a slight orange tint to it. Also, even though the product doesn't have ammonia, it did manage to make my scalp hurt during coloring. It's not a bad hair color product, it just is not right for those of us with sensitive scalps. I tried it because I was trying to get away from chemicals. Color stayed without much fade, but I can't imagine using this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That wore off after a day but I just monitor the time better now.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brand for about 12 years. It is a natural looking colour as long as you don't try to change your colour too much. Mine does fade a little over the weeks but it still looks natural. My skin is sensitive but I don't have a problem with this product. I leave it on for about 40 mins. The one time I left it on for close to an hour I found some areas of my scalp felt itchy. That wore off after a day but I just monitor the time better now.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Received an open-box and looks like used package
customer_reviews.text: When I got the package and opened it, the box inside was already open. I think it is not a new box and it might have already been used since the fluids in one of the bottles that is supposed to be 60ml was not even close to 60ml. Disappointing and inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product NOT USABLE
customer_reviews.text: Product was leaking out out both bottles, side of bottle smashed in...leaking all over
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Lynn Komlos

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving you a 4 as the product arrived a day late. I really like this product as it is not harsh and it's easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Jani Shuttleworth

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Works extremely well. I use it to cover my grays. I use half of the product for my roots and save the remainder to be used 6 weeks later. No odor. Covers well.
customer_reviews.author: Katie B.

customer_reviews.title: Its ok...
customer_reviews.text: Let's face it, there is no such thing as chemical free permanent hair color, so this one is not an exception. I bought it thinking maybe it would just be less harsh. It does smell much better than it's pharmacy counterparts. However, what I noticed is that coverage is not that great. I have had better luck with your everyday store brands that cost half as much. Not that it fades quicker, but I had trouble getting the routes done properly. So at the end of the day, I'm not a convert and will probably go back to that.
customer_reviews.author: Poison Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Best Natural product out there
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing like this. Everything else stains your skin or has ammonia or peroxide but this has no harsh chemicals. This just gets deep into the follicles & gives the color you want. Others complain about amount given (2.1 oz's of color & 2.1 oz's of developer) lol. I've got such short hair that I can color my hair (including the grey) 15 times easy before I need another. It doesn't spoil on purpose like other products when opened.
customer_reviews.author: mark hazlewood

customer_reviews.title: A must for naturals
customer_reviews.text: Ive been a fan of this product for over a decade, it does change the texture of my kinky hair which I love, and I change colors often with no hair damage. A must for naturals.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Girl

customer_reviews.title: Lasts 5 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product, no harsh smell, easy to apply (not drippy). The best part is it lasts on my hair for 5 weeks with zero red-brassiness which happened to me with various brands of hair dye and eventually also with the Surya Henna Creme which was great in the beginning and then seemed to "wear off" as I used it longer. Loving this product.
customer_reviews.author: KarenW803

customer_reviews.title: Not a desirable color.
customer_reviews.text: This made my hair a tan color which was not desired probably by anyone. I also tried mixing with the wheat blond color, but it was still brassy. I do appreciate that many harsh chemicals were not used in this product as I wanted something more natural.
customer_reviews.author: granola girl

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FOR THE PRICE LOOKS OK AS PHOTO FAST DELIVERY
customer_reviews.text: GOOD FOR THE PRICE LOOKS OK AS PHOTO FAST DELIVERY DOES NOT GIVE BLOND COLOR IT GIVES MOST OFF ORANGE-REDISH COLOR
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Good product but short lasting
customer_reviews.text: I used this to color my grey roots since all salons were closed for a while. I chose a color slightly darker than the one I get at the salon just to be sure I get good coverage. This was easy to use, smelled good and seemed like it had the minimum amount of chemicals for box dye. Only complaint is that after 3 weeks it’s already wearing off.
customer_reviews.author: Omid Shaye

customer_reviews.title: Hair lost
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. I colored my hair 2 month ago. My hair is falling out so bad. My doctor said it's bcs of hair coloring. I never had this problem before.
customer_reviews.author: NaturePhotosYP

customer_reviews.title: What happened?
customer_reviews.text: Did Naturtint change the formulas? I've been blending 4N and 5N and get a nice medium brown. This time my hair came out practically black. It's totally different -- and not good at all. I'm so disappointed...have to find another product after years and years of happy use.
customer_reviews.author: shashinyc

customer_reviews.title: Extremely drying
customer_reviews.text: I die my hair the same shade as my natural color just to keep it shiny and get rid of the red tones caused by the sun. This didn't have too bad of a smell and came out the shade I expected, but it was extraordinarily drying. The conditioner it comes with doesn't seem to moisturize at all and even after using other heavy duty masks and moisture treatments, my hair is still struggling to recover. Previously I had been using natural match and natural instincts which I will be going back to. I'd like to go the natural route, but really dislike having straw for hair.
customer_reviews.author: Rashella

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Simple enough to use, but left my ends absolutely dry and would not wash out of my hair for three days. Left it greasy and heavy underneath. Will never use this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Bailey

product_meta.title: Naturtint Permanent Hair Color 9N Honey Blonde (Pack of 1), Ammonia Free, Vegan, Cruelty Free, up to 100% Gray Coverage, Long Lasting Results
product_meta.description:
Color:9N Honey Blonde

Enriched with plant & seed oils and extracts, Naturtint Permanent Hair Color provides everything you need to color, nourish and protect your hair and scalp in one complete treatment. Dermatologist tested to ensure it is gentle on the hair and scalp, Naturtint’s naturally derived plant ingredients deliver deep hydration and softness with natural looking results. The ammonia free formula eliminates harsh odors and contains no artificial fragrances, gluten, parabens, resorcinol or heavy metals. Naturtint is vegan and cruelty free!

1 box is typically enough for shoulder length hair. If your hair is longer than shoulder length, we recommend using 2 boxes. Box contains everything you need to color, nourish, protect and care for your hair and scalp in one complete treatment.

Leading in Innovation:
For more than 20 years Naturtint has been at the forefront of reducing the amount of chemicals in hair color. The innovation of Naturtint’s manufacturer, Phergal Laboratories in Madrid, Spain led to a permanent ammonia free hair color in 1994. Through Phergal’s advanced technology and strong quality management systems, Naturtint adheres to ethical manufacturing principles and strict EU (European Union) regulations.

Team USA:
We are family owned and operated, distributing Naturtint in the USA since 1999! Our mission has always been to inspire, educate, and empower our community so that together we can make the world a better place.

Important Information:
See instruction leaflet enclosed in each Naturtint kit for complete application instructions.

Always perform a Color Strand Test and Sensitivity Test 48 hours prior to each use.

Coloring your hair with Naturtint Permanent Hair Color is comparable to other at home hair color kits.

Have questions?
Give our color specialists a call 877-372-6567
feature_bullets: BETTER INGREDIENTS, Better Color, Better You!
FREE FROM Ammonia, Parabens, Artificial Fragrance, Resorcinol, Heavy Metals, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate and Sodium Laureth Sulfate.
ENRICHED WITH PLANT INGREDIENTS like Oleic Acid, derived from olives, and Meadowfoam Seed Oil to nourish and moisturize your hair for added softness and shine.
UP TO 100 % GRAY COVERAGE for long-lasting, natural-looking results with 32 mixable shades to choose from that deliver vibrant color, deep hydration and gorgeous hair.
VEGAN AND CRUELTY FREE, so you can feel good about making an ethical choice.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
